name: BS F-Zero Deluxe
description:
F-Zero was a launch title for the SNES, introducing the world to futuristic racing with the original 4 machines, 3 leagues, and 15 courses. In 1996-1997, Nintendo and St. Giga distributed F-Zero to their Super Famicom Satellaview subscribers with 2 multi-week, timed events. BS F-Zero Grand Prix contained 4 new machines and 19 courses, including 4 new courses across 4 remixed leagues. BS F-Zero Grand Prix 2 used only the 4 new machines and 4 new courses from BS F-Zero Grand Prix, along with 6 more new courses, for a total of 2 leagues. A downloadable companion game, BS F-Zero 2 Practice, allowed players to race on 5 of the new courses, and has been preserved. Sadly, no known copies of the 5 Forest and Metal Fort courses have ever been found.
BS F-Zero Deluxe combines all 3 games into a single package, with the 5 lost courses meticulously restored from recorded footage. Two new leagues have been named BS-1 and BS-2, and present the 10 new courses as they were in BS F-Zero Grand Prix 2. Choose from any of the 8 machines, and race on 25 courses across 5 leagues

You only have a limited amount of fuel. So that your spaceship doesn't break down, the speed when it touches down must not be more than 1.99998.

You control the spaceship with the joystick on the right and left in joyport 1. To ignite the braking rockets, press fire. Remember you can only do one thing, steering or brake!!!

Good luck comander

The open ending

name: Toppled
description:
Toppled is a daily word game. Your challenge: to create four valid five-letter words and Topple the wall.

Beware though! You may make 3 great words and be left with 5 letters that simply can't make a word. This would be a failed attempt at toppling the wall.

Fewer attempts and words = a higher score!

Every wall also contains four GOLDEN words (ooooh!) these are worth a whopping 100 points each. To help you find them, their starting letters are highlighted gold.

The gamble you have to make is... do you try for the golden word bonus and increase your word count? Or just play it safe with some regular words?

Everyone faces the same wall each day but there's no one solution to each wall. How you try and topple it is up to you!

Last Expedition is an exciting new PVPVE extraction FPS that challenges the player to retrieve valuable alien artifacts from the hostile planet, Aura. This experience will challenge players skills, focus and resourcefulness while rewarding them through unique opportunities of Web3 technology.

Created by the renowned development studio Certain Affinity led by Halo 2 veteran Max Hoberman, Last Expedition will bring world class AAA gaming and play-to-earn empowerment together in a historic and explosive combination.

In Last Expedition, players will face off against a hostile alien world in which everything and everyone wants to annihilate them. In addition to the intense focus and skill required for successful FPS gaming, blockchain ownership will allow for cutting edge layers of resourcefulness and strategy, requiring players to build, grow and survive in new ways.

description: Illang is a free-to-play multiplayer social deduction game where players help the villagers of Koji Village find the sneaky Illang who has been wreaking havoc! Play with up to 20 players and work together to stop the Illang, but be warned, even your closest ally may turn out to be the very wolf in sheep's clothing you're looking for.

name: Box To The Beat VR: Shadow Dreams Pack
description: Unleash your inner champion with the "Shadow Dreams Pack" DLC for our boxing rhythm game. Immerse yourself in 40+ minutes of intense progressive death metal tracks made from Khosouf studio founder's original album.

name: Border Bots VR
description:
Border Bots VR is puzzle simulation set on a future earth where AI is in control. As a human border agent, you begin a new role as a booth operator at an AI travel border. Interact and check over a variety of robots as they try to get through security. Some of their credentials might not be up to scratch, its up to you to make sure they get the stamp of approval.

Analyse Documents

Step into the booth as a border control agent and swiftly process robots by analysing their documents for discrepancies, oddities, undeclared modifications and contraband!

Booth and Apartment Upgrades

Earn credits through challenging gameplay to purchase booth upgrades to keep yourself ahead of the competition. You can also spend your credits on apartment customisations and bring your space to life!

Quirky Robots!

Meet and interact with a variety of quirky robots at the booth and in your apartment! Come face-to-face with sentient appliances as you discover more about their newfound consciousness and colourful personalities.

Variety of Gadgets

Use a variety of tactile gadgets in VR to examine robots at the booth. You'll need different tools for inspection including a 3D printer, Contraband Detector, Stun Gun, Barcode Scanner and much more.

name: Hentai Senpai: Cosmic Beauties
description: Hentai Senpai: Cosmic Beauties is a FREE swapping/rotating puzzle game featuring 9 sexy Cosmic Beauties!

name: Truck Simulator USA Revolution
description:
From the makers of Bus Simulator 2023 comes the new and improved Truck Simulator USA Revolution. Want to know what driving an 18 Wheeler feels like? Truck Simulator USA offers a real trucking experience that will let you explore amazing locations. This American Truck Simulator features many American and European semi truck brands and all kinds of big rigs with realistic engine sounds and detailed interiors! Drive across America, transport cool trailers such as vehicles, gasoline, gravel, food, ship anchors, helicopters, and many more… Become a professional truck driver and enjoy the career and the online multiplayer mode!
Drive your favorite American or Euro truck across the American continent, play Truck Simulator USA Revolution!

name: Pechka
description: This game portrays the tragic history of war in a 2D adventure format, set against real events. It provides a realistic experience, encompassing themes of betrayal, death, and love, while also offering multiple endings driven by player choices. Discover the impact of this era's tragedy firsthand

name: Ultratoro 2

name: Shanghai Summer
description: Shanghai Summer is an adventure game set in the millennium. Our protagonist, Baichuan, goes through a series of "anomalies" over the length of twelve days. In his pursuit of the truth, he found that his hopes and regrets from the past finally seem to converge. Will he be able to "fix" it for good?

Inspired by games such as Escape from Tarkov and DayZ, featuring different scenarios from scavenging to looting and crafting. Will you survive long enough to make it out alive?

name: The Inquisitor
description:
The Inquisitor is a story-driven, dark renaissance, action-adventure mystery game set in an alternate history 1500’s. In this world, Jesus did not die on the cross. Instead, he broke free from his crucifixion and unleashed bloody vengeance on those who did not believe in him. Centuries pass and now an army of zealot Inquisitors brutally enforce the faith of this blood-hungry Church that has taken hold in Europe.

You play as one such Inquisitor in service this The Holy Office - Mordimer Madderdin. Dispatched to the despondent town of Konigstein, you will be tasked with dealing with the various crimes and transgressions of the common folk, all while dealing with an ancient evil that is trying to take root around you.

name: Small War
description: You need to choose your camp and build the building! Build combat units through barracks and factories, and then manipulate combat units to destroy enemy bases!

In a party game for 5 to 10 players, a secret group of Leakers undermine President Puma and his Loyalists by earning their trust and leaking their confidential affairs to media. Bluff, betray, confide and conspire in a crossover between Jackbox and social deduction games.

Brawl in turn-based combat with timed hits & combos, to reveal the dark truth that plagues the city’s core and your sanity.

The planet H-004 has only five inhabitants: a reclusive scientist, a paranoid doctor, a scrappy mechanic, a shady mining executive, and a surprisingly human-like AI system.

If your intel is right, one of them is a murderer.

Play as Hordeus Sung, an IA agent sent by ICARUS (Intergalactic College of Animatronics, Robotics, and Universal Science) to investigate the death of Dante Gallagher, H-004's late Superintendent.

Remember: not everything is as it seems, and loneliness… is everywhere.

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Complete Edition
description:
Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty is a historical fantasy action role-playing video game developed by Team Ninja and published by Koei Tecmo.

Set during a fictionalised version of the fall of the Han Dynasty, the plot follows an unnamed protagonist who battles historical characters and Chinese mythological creatures corrupted by demonic qi.

The Complete Edition of "Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty" includes all three paid DLCs: "Battle of Zhongyuan", "Conqueror of Jiangdong", and "Upheaval in Jingxiang".

name: Heroes of the Seasons
description: Heroes of the Seasons is a turn-based boss-rush RPG. Hire 3 mercenaries to defend Christmas from Christmas haters who offer challenging battles. Customize & build your party with different mercenary compositions & equipment builds. Decorate your home & get to know your people.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Season 2
description:
Survive the decay: After Konni Group infiltrated a Mediterranean island, conducting nefarious experiments that have recently — and catastrophically — changed Fortune’s Keep forever, it’s up to you and your squad to survive the decay, battling and hunting down the undead infiltrating every part of Season 2’s colossal content offering! Help is at hand, as Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes from AMC’s The Walking Dead and CIA Station Chief Kate Laswell headline the Season 2 Battle Pass.

Expect a truly immense content offering, including new Multiplayer maps, four new weapons, Aftermarket Parts (including your own underbarrel chainsaw!), Ranked Play for both Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone, new Zombies Dark Aether Rift investigations, events, challenges, secrets, and a skeletal theme to BlackCell, led by the mysterious John Doe Operator.

CONTENT SUMMARY:

- A massive Multiplayer map offering! Four new Core 6v6 maps arrive across Season 2, including three brand-new 6v6 maps and a fan-favorite remaster.
- Two map variants: Ready up for Hordepoint and the Vortex Mid-Season Playlist, explore two otherworldly themed map variants based on Skidrow and Terminal.
- New War map: Assault a downtown Urzikstan skyscraper from the skies. Welcome to Operation Tin Man.
- Five game modes and a Vortex Playlist: Bring home a win in Team Gun Game; quickscope your way to victory in Snipers Only; enjoy the return of Hordepoint and Bounty; and battle rival Juggernauts in the Juggermosh pit!
- Season 2 Ranked Play: Claim the Ranked Play rewards you unlocked in Season 1, then continue the grind with a full season and all-new rewards to earn.
- New Ninja Vest: Favoring those knives only? Equip the Ninja Vest for silent running, as well as a bonus knife and throwing star ammo.

This is a game for people who have lost their cats in real life, in this game, players can DIY their own cat image.Players can run with cat,earn gold coins, buy cat food in the cat star scene, and continue to complete the fate of feeding and accompanying cats.

name: RPG Conquer the World
description: Pixel art RPG adventure. Experience the story of a common young boy, visit school, fight enemies, find your first love, and most importantly: Conquer the world!

name: Dinos vs. Robots
description: Dinos vs. Robots - Robots from the Future time travel to the Present to fight Dinos from the Past.

name: Solar Serpent Squadron
description: Solar Serpent Squadron is a survivor bullet heaven game with snake-like movement. You will build your snake "body" as weapons, and destroy hundreds of enemies swarm coming right at you!

name: The Lancaster Leak: Entity Exam
description: Another tape has been leaked, this time a recording of a training protocol. By answering questions and resisting jumpscares, can you beat the Entity Exam?

name: Reazione a Catena
description: Trivia and cooperative game to play with friends

name: Gothic Virtual Tabletop
description: Gothic Virtual Tabletop is a virtual tabletop application that can be customized to support nearly any TTRPG or Wargame.

name: Bang
description: This is a realistic virtual life simulator where you can walk and chat. In this game you are with your AI girlfriend in an office. You can see the ai dance, workout, and you can do adult only activities such as sex in various position like doggy style and others.

name: Street Clean TD
description: Protect the streets from the living trash.

name: Store Simulator
description: You've embarked on a journey to acquire your dream market and have finally reached your goal. Now, manage your market to offer friendly service to the neighborhood! Provide a range of products, from beverages to food, cleaning items to electronics, meeting community needs.

name: The Lord of Darkness: The Awakening of the Light
description: Immerse yourself in a visual novel of adventures and crucial decisions in a fantasy world on the brink of conflict. Forge alliances and fight evil to save the ones you love.

name: Atomic Heart: Trapped in Limbo
description: The Trapped in Limbo DLC is included in the Atomic Pass. Requires the base game Atomic Heart to run.Continue the story by coming back to the mad world of Limbo! Get through a combat extravaganza and Limbo-flavored challenges to learn P-3&rsquos fate.

name: O! Holy Knight
description: O! Holy Knight is a survivors game that focuses on controlling a fantasy medieval squad of knights to survive waves of monsters.

name: Connected Hearts: Cost of Beauty Collector's Edition
description: Brand new story, same old techniques. Have you heard that the evil stepmother is a witch? Oh, sorry, now you know, and she'll want to get rid of you. Be careful!

name: Town Adventures
description: Immerse yourself in the joy of exploration, tranquility, and discovery. Unwind and relax as you navigate the towns.

name: Friendly Snowball
description:
Friendly Snowball is a multiplayer PvP action game.

You prepare for a slippery battle where you hit frosty balls with your giant hammer to score.
You use power ups scattered throughout the arena to help you beat the opponent team.
Play with friends and have fun in a snowy environment!

name: Foamstars: Season 1
description:
Season One: Starry Pop
The first Season runs between Tuesday February 6, 2024, and Friday March 8, 2024. During that time, you’ll be able to take part in seasonal events where you’ll compete for rankings and enjoy different game modes!

name: Block Hunter
description: Block Hunter is a music rhythm game that combines party game, online and local competitions, and maybe rogue-lite genes.hope you guys enjoy it !

name: Blackout
description: A single-player zombies experience. Players are armed with diverse weapons, unique abilities, bullet types, and more to face relentless hordes of cunning enemies. Navigate the in-depth DnD-style progression system, in this riveting journey through an ever-increasing wave of undead threats.

name: Hello New World
description: A simple adventure about your life in the new world.

name: Firework Survivor
description: "Firework Survivor" is a SurvivorLike game with the theme of fireworks. In the game, you will enter the dreamland of a kitten, which is full of dangers, but the only thing that can help it is - fireworks!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - If One Dreams At Midnight
description:
Version 2.0 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Black Swan, Sparkle and Misha
• New Trailblaze Mission: Long Day's Journey Into Night
• New planet: Penacony, the Planet of Festivities
• New enemies: Dreamjolt Troupe, Memory Zone Memes and more
• New quality of life updates
• …and more!

name: 24H Stories: The Rule 7
description: Recently, people in Japan have been talking about an urban legend: a mysterious program is circulating on the internet. The person who activates this program must follow 7 rules within a week, or they will face punishment, even death. In 7 days, various maddening supernatural events will occur.

name: Alisa: Developer's Cut
description: Can you survive the Dollhouse? Alisa is a Horror-themed Action Adventure game, and a genuine throwback to the golden age of 90's 3D games.

name: Noxium
description: Welcome to your new job mining Noxium for a sketchy business. Keep the power on and everything should be fine.

name: Onward and Upward! DX
description: Climb from the Earth to the Moon to try and solve an urban legend! Brave tough challenges as you float and grapple your way up to the tune of a great soundtrack! Be sure to bring a space suit, and get climbing!

name: My Anima Boy
description: A short visual novel depicting the struggles and romantic entanglements of a composer attempting to write lyrics for the first time in his life. It's a BL (Boys' Love) story.

name: Amidst The Haze
description: Enter a world where survival becomes a lethal game. In "Amidst The Haze", your simple trip to the supermarket turns into a terrifying nightmare when a thick, unfathomable fog engulfs the city, isolating the supermarket as the only safe haven.

name: Space Garbage
description: Do you like Tetris? Doesn't matter. Space Garbage is here to rotate Tetris 90 degrees on its head and add a little car to it. Blast and stack your way to the top of the leaderboard with this farm-to-table, indie, retro, solo, arcade... experience!

name: Slot Shots Pinball: Ultimate Edition
description: Get ready for some good 'ol fashion pinball fun with eleven tables ready for you! Bigger playfields, better physics, longer soundtracks, and more slot machine shots! Prepare yourself for the ultimate edition of Slot Shots Pinball featuring four unreleased tables along with some classics.

name: Goblin's Bizarre Adventure
description: This is a maze puzzle game. It mainly tells that a goblin keeps avoiding the pursuer in order to live freely. It cannot escape the pursuit alone and needs your help. So can you help him escape?

name: Finding Anastasia
description: Finding Anastasia is a 3D first person horror game. You have to find missing girlfriend Anastasia.

name: Little Droid
description: In the game "Little Droid" you will find exciting levels with a variety of traps, obstacles and riddles. You will explore amazing locations including a secret bunker, deep dungeons and mysterious forests. Each level offers new challenges and secrets to uncover.

name: Murder Is Game Over: Deal Killer
description: Murder Is Game Over: Deal Killer takes you on an immersive journey through the Italian Alps. Unravel the murder mystery amidst an alpine backdrop, exploring opulent settings and unmasking the killer in this thrilling detective game.

name: Foamstars
description:
A 4v4 online party shooter from Square Enix that has you battling to foam as much of the city as you can while avoiding your opponents traps and weapons.

Use foam to build terrain, creating slippery surfaces to surf around the arena at high speed, help defend from enemy attacks, or create vantage points to take out opponents.

And most importantly, to foam up the opposition!

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Timeshift
description: Timeshift is a unique take on 2D platformers. Use a saved position and your momentum to escape the Rift!

name: Cyberlinxx
description: Experience the thrills of a cyberpunk adventure with a cast of strong, independent women. Dive into the shadows of the Megacity Arriaka and find out who wanted to kill you.

name: Escape the Dead
description: You awake inside of a cave in Starnex Island with your handgun and double barrel shotgun, ready to shoot anything that gets in your way of escaping the island of Starnex.

name: Exotica: Petshop Simulator
description: Exotica is a simulation game where you run an exotic pet shop in the city.

name: HellEscape
description: HellEscape is a 2D bullet hell with auto-fire and roguelike elements.

name: Clem
description: Clem is a narrative-driven puzzle adventure game with a dark twist. Wake up in a world where puzzles intertwine with exploration, weaving a unique narrative rooted in alchemy. A voice awakens you. It gives you purpose. To guide you, you find a notebook with mysterious entries and a house to explore.

name: Hua Mulan: A Chinese Learning Adventure
description: Travel back in time to help defend Hua Mulan against evil time bandits all while learning Chinese in this story-driven, role-playing, open 3D world episodic adventure.

name: Arms Trade Tycoon: Tanks
description: Arms Trade Tycoon: Tanks is a unique combination of tank design and tycoon game. It puts you in charge of an arms trading company specialized in tanks from WWI to the modern era. Research, design, sell and follow your tanks in battle to make your own history!

name: Dwarves & Dungeons
description: The game is innovated on the traditional game of Match-3 Puzzler, combined with the elements of rougelike game, adding hard core content, bringing a new and unique experience.

name: Sheepy: A Short Adventure
description: Sheepy: A Short Adventure is a short handcrafted pixel art platformer that follows Sheepy, an abandoned plushy brought to life.

name: Om6n
description: Darkness has swept over a once peaceful world and an malevolent omen has awoken. Will you brave these demonic legions - or fall victim with the rest?

name: Dreamspace
description: Dreamspace is an atmospheric game about dreams. Explore surreal locations and meet different NPCs. The game contains 17 unique dreams and takes about 30 minutes to complete. The game was made for LSDJam 2023 in 3 months.

name: Passing Into Fantasy
description: Otaku culture inspired top-down danmaku shooter.

name: Love Is All Around: Love In The Room
description: "Xiamen, I'm here!" You will play as the male protagonist Gu Yi and immerse yourself in a unique shared living life with three beautiful roommates in Xiamen from a first person perspective.Who you would choose at the end, is up to you to decide.

name: Sweet Hell
description: Your brother has taken over your throne. Reclaim it by defeating his eight legendary monster guardians.

name: Geometry Survivor
description: Geometry Survivor is a survival rogue-lite game, where you fight with waves of shapes and trying to find a way from madness.It might be difficult, but also [DATA LOSS]

name: Aquatic Adventure
description: Talk with a cast of colorful characters and play minigames to save a flooded town.

name: Happy New Year, Zeliria!: Dragon!
description: Friends! We present you another New Year's story about the heroes of the sanctuary of Zeliria! The addition to our first story is called "The Dragon" and tells how the Chinese New Year was celebrated on Zeliria. Have a nice game!

name: Project Wand: Festival Of Futas
description: Join the Festival of Futas, a survival contest commemorating the first Wandkin warrior, as you compete (and do other stuff) along your fellow questionably-dressed contestants!

name: Tenno
description: Dive into the captivating world of "Tenno", where the art of the ninja takes center stage. Craft your very own ninja, molding their appearance and abilities to match your vision.

name: Martyrdom
description: Martyrdom is a psychological horror game about torture.

name: Delicious Donut
description: Donut puzzles. Very. Delicious.

name: Idle Animal Anatomy
description: A colorful clicker simulator where you can yourself grow a living creature cell by cell! Watch how organs, bones and skin are growing! Feel like a real scientist by becoming a pet creator!

name: Back Rank Chess: Zombie Strike
description: Zombie Pawns are coming for the Back Rank!

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: NBA/NHL/MLB/NFL DLC Pack
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: NBA/NHL/MLB/NFL

name: Atoz
description:
You are Atoz and you love eating letters. But you can only tolerate them if you take them in alphabetical order. Therefore, if you don't follow the alphabetical order or eat a brick, the game is over.

Once you have eaten all the letters, the next level moves a little faster.

name: Hardware Hustle
description:
Buy, make, sell, and research your way to profit without burning out!

Hardware Hustle is a really fun turn-based resource management game that simulates the running of a small hardware business over 6 days. You'll be buying parts, making and selling widgets, researching and improving each part of the business, trying to make as much money as possible. The game board for each day resembles a spreadsheet from the 1980s (including the green-on-black text aesthetic).

name: Waidh
description: Imagine one day you wake up in the middle of a jungle without knowing who you are and what are you doing there. That's where the story of WAIDH begins. Try to survive the elements of the infinite jungle and of course, try to find the answers for those questions to solve the mystery of the game.

name: Building Block Cities: Fire Copter Drills
description: This game includes two major parts: building a city scene using the given building blocks and finishing fire copter drills on the scene. The building blocks can be assembled by matching color-coded faces on the blocks, and a drill is finished after the fire copter flies through all waypoint gates.

name: The Devil's Typist
description: Random and endless typing game with rich elements and items.

name: SprintLine
description: Can you make it to the end of the line?

name: Ichorous
description:
A long-imprisoned God of Blood has made you their disciple. Kill their monstrosities still roaming the land and return the godly blood, Ichor, to restore your Patron to their full power.

Master the Offerings of The Patron and combine them for crazy synergies and boosts!

name: Final Desolation
description:
A 100% vanilla 8 level DOOM wad, dedicated to Cacodoomonic's beloved late doggie Layla and their beloved late mother, both of which loved DOOM, and often used to watch them playing it. They both passed away, their dog on August 3rd 2023 and their mother September 27th 2023. This game is dedicated to them both and may their memory live on forever in this mod.

The wad is an 8 level chapter starring Joan Dark as she fights against the forces of Hell as it invades the UAC bases and gradually takes over. A powerful demon, code-named only DESOLATION, has risen from the depths of Hell and brought with it an army of darkness that is utterly relentless. DoomGuy isn't around. Nobody is around except the demonically possessed corpses of former fellow UAC military... so it's up to Joan Dark to deal with this on her own.

name: Hentai Golf: Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Damn it!
description: Climb to the top with the help of marshmallows.

name: Black Gunner Wukong
description:
Black Gunner Wukong is a Rougelike type shooting game.
In the game, the player takes on the role of Wukong , who enters a U.S. military base to rescue his master who has been captured by Diden.
In the game, all creatures are identified as armed helicopters and supermarket shopping bags, not as female and male!

name: Beetle Nest
description: Try yourself as a commander in the new Rouge-lite shooter with a top view! Upgrade your clones, explore planets, unlock new weapons and costumes. Don't let the waves of hostile creatures defeat you!

name: 50CK3T
description: A story-based indie platform puzzler set in a post-apocalyptic city. Socket and Birdie jump, swing, and build their way through increasingly difficult puzzles as they're shared battery continually drains.

name: Hooligan Crusoe
description: You encountered a storm at sea and unexpectedly arrived at this small island. On this island, you can start a new life through activities like planting, construction, fishing, and more. Experience the storyline with various NPCs as you join the team to build and develop the small island!

name: Jax: History Repeats Itself
description: Jax: History Repeats Itself is an exciting horror game. Inspired by other animatronic-mascot-horror games, this game follows the story of Ernel, a young man hired as a security guard, and his adventure throughout his mandatory 5 nights at Jax's Burgers.

name: IFU
description: IFU is a psychological horror about a young guy who is forcibly locked in an abandoned mansion of a dead surgeon along with his restless soul.

name: Party PooperZ
description: Party Pooperz is an awesome chaotic partygame, where you compete against your friends. The fate of tonight's party theme rests on your shoulders, steal guests and use items to make your party the most popular. Let the battle for the most legendary party begin!

name: House of Jigsaw: Beautiful Flowers
description: This DLC adds a burst of natural splendor to the House of Jigsaw universe, challenging you to test your puzzle-solving prowess in a garden of vibrant hues!

name: SaGaS
description: SaGaS is a project based on new Chinese grotesque Cthulhu theme, integrating the old Hong Kong retro style and background settings of the 20th century. It is a fan project based on Scara-Ei character shipping from Genshin Impact. The game uses puzzles and maze solving as its main gameplay.

name: Project Hybrid
description: In Project Hybrid, you'll find yourself ensnared, desperately seeking an escape while unraveling the enigma of your surroundings and the mysterious circumstances that brought you here.

name: Cthulhu Tower
description: Cthulhu Tower is a dark twist on classical tower defense genre where you try to protect your eldrich world from cruel crowds of humans!

name: Brownie's Adventure
description: A fantasy point and click adventure in traditional 1990s style. Dark humour, player choices that have impact on your outcome and hours of daft shenanigans.

name: Spectator 2
description: Welcome to the world of Spectator 2 – the sequel to the gripping horror game Spectator! Brace yourself for new levels of atmospheric terror and captivating surveillance, you'll face even more chilling events and dangers as you carefully monitor cameras and report any suspicious occurrences.

name: Cthulhu Must Die
description: Cthulhu Must Die is an acton-roguelike bullethell where you have to track and hunt down Cthulhu to finish him while surviving his hordes of minions. Choose from a variety of characters, weapons and upgrades to create unique builds and save the day.

name: Youtuber Survivors
description: Youtuber Survivors is a 2D action roguelike game where players can easily execute exhilarating combos with simple button controls and customize their own combos.

name: Detective Ridelle
description: Detective Ridelle is a cozy murder mystery game featuring escape room style puzzles. Find clues, interrogate suspects, solve the mystery - before it's too late.

name: Burrito Bear
description: Burritos are raining from the sky - Bear wants to eat them, but colliding with dangerous falling garbage causes serious gas! Before indigestion strikes, Bear needs your help to eat them all!

name: The Isle of Elanor
description: You wash ashore on The Isle of Elanor, the last bastion of humanity remaining in the world. The situation on the island is grim. You're given a small plot of land. Can you help humanity survive?

name: Chipi Chapa: Brick Breaker
description: Destroy blocks to to the music of Chipi Chipi Chapa Chapa.

name: Shop Legends
description: Immerse yourself in an Idle Simulation Tycoon RPG like no other, where you are tasked with managing a thriving item shop, crafting legendary gear for customers, commanding mighty heroes to loot rare artifacts & blueprints all while challenging top-ranked shopkeepers in an epic business adventure!

name: Law of Dispute
description: "The Law of Dispute" is a medieval realistic style auto chess + card type roguelike strategy game, building a deck of light strategy auto chess card battles on a 3 * 2 battlefield and achieving the final victory!

name: Home Path
description: Home Path is a Rogue-Like Action game where you play as a Slime that has to go to different platforms to save a Little Girl that she has found.

name: Orbo
description: In this game, you operate the ORBO starship using the crank. Rogue satellites, controlled by the AI, try to destroy you. Fortunately, they lack weapons and resort to sheer numbers, sacrificing themselves in attempts to take you down.

name: Sinister Night 2
description: Nine Streamers enter an ancient Chinese mansion, hoping to attract a huge following and become famous through livestreaming. However, two of them are tragically possessed by evil spirits. These possessed will slaughter their companions, and complete a malevolent ritual of a ghostly wedding.

name: Tales of Spark: Dragon-Horse Spirit
description: This content requires the base game https://store.steampowered.com/app/2165390/Tales_of_Spark/ on Steam in order to play.

name: Jousting in January
description: Murderize your enemy(ies). No retreat. No surrender.

name: Frog Story: The Power Tongue
description: Join a thrilling journey with a tiny frog and its mighty tongue, collecting fireflies and sealing the shadows of the Dark Toad King. Navigate through a charming puzzle-platformer world across 96 carefully crafted levels.

name: Soulivion II
description: ​Soulivion II is an immersive fantasy role-playing game with an in-depth demonic companion. Dominate the afterlife and decide the fate of everything.

name: Madam President: She’s My Boss
description: As the school's self-proclaimed bounty hunter, you tend to cause more problems than you actually solve. But after standing up to the principal, you catch the eye of the beautiful student council president, who immediately recruits you as her hired muscle. With the help of her sweet secretary and, surprisingly, your worst enemy, it's time to embark on a mission to rectify the school's problems—starting with the principal himself! Can you save the campus from utter chaos while winning the hearts of these three gorgeous girls?

name: Wizard War Online
description: Wizard War Online offers a P2P game mode and a game mechanic you are not used to. While flying with the sweeper, you will experience a different flight experience thanks to the customizable maneuver settings. Make strategic moves and pay attention to timing while fighting your enemies.

name: The Mystery of Mount Fang
description: This is a vanilla-compatible four map mini WAD titled "The Mystery of Mount Fang". After enjoying your "vacation", you're hired by an anonymous benefactor to go hiking in Mount Fang, a huge mountain located in Hell. Your mission: To gather information and clues about about a long extinct civilisation that apparently worshipped a guardian spirit taking on the appearance of a huge shark. But you have a suspicion that the thing who hired you knows more about this place than they let on...

name: Grejsimojs
description: An anachronistic 90s-style Episode 2 Replacement.

name: Chasing Bottaflies
description: Chasing Bottaflies is a short puzzle-adventure game, featuring the character Fluffle Puff who got lost in a deep forest. To find her way home she will have to capture various "bottaflies", most of which are hidden in secret places that need good observation skills or understanding of various hints to be found. Going through three surprising areas, she will eventually find a bottafly big enough to carry her back... and maybe something else.

name: Exit Kun
description: You are trapped in the Ikun passage. Carefully observe: singing, dancing, rap, and basketball so you can leave here. Look carefully and reach the "Exit Kun ". A meme game inspired by Exit 8.

name: Forgiveness RPG: The First Chapter - Part One
description: Sin descripción

name: The Vast Silence

name: Remix Jam
description: Remix Jam is a 30 (+start) map jam for the Copper mod (included) that takes iconic Multiplayer layouts from various games and adapts them into the Quake universe

name: Krypta FM
description: Can you solve the mystery of the Beast of Gozdary?

name: PipeMaster
description: Connect the pipes using new items from stock (limited), or resue items on the field if available. Beware, you also have time limit!

name: Kaiki: Okujou no Yuurei to Akuma no Gishiki
description: Sin descripción

name: The Vanished Sister

name: Top Web Search 23

description: Master the Ocean's Challenges: Craft, fish, defend against sharks, and expand your raft into a thriving haven in this immersive and unforgiving survival simulator.

name: Star Lone Wolf
description: Select unique spaceship models and multiple talents from 80+ options. Explore the world map, complete missions for gold, and shop for items. Defeat foes, earn experience, and enhance your spaceship's modules. Forge your style and prove its strength.

name: Wolf The Lone Hunt
description: Play as wolf with the ability to transform into a werewolf. Explore, hunt your prey and overpower mighty foes.

name: Deadlocked
description: Deadlocked is an adrenaline-packed Top-Down shooter where you'll confront hordes of relentless robotic foes. Unleash futuristic weapons, master strategic combat, and prove your mettle against the mechanical onslaught. Can you outmanoeuvre and overpower the relentless enemy threat?

name: Fantasy Temptations

name: No.HazedHeart

name: Abyssmare
description: Abyssmare is a near future science fiction world view based on the Cthulhu Mythos world view, and an action game based on Roguelite+first person shooting. In this game, you will battle against the crazy "Super Soldiers" and monsters, as well as the Great Old Ones.

name: Soak & Splash
description: The game is an ultimate sauna experience where players can enjoy socializing with friends and strangers that easily can become friends. It's all about having fun, relaxing, and experiencing the unique benefits of sauna culture.

name: Tales of Spark
description: "Tales of Spark" is a Hack & Slash Action RPG with an Eastern flair. Players assume the role of a young wandering swordsman, exploring the vast desert, seeking treasures, defeating powerful bosses, and even slaying gigantic celestial dragons.

name: Defense Contract
description: Defense Contract is a futuristic grapple-hook racing game. Complete challenging, puzzling races in as short a time as possible in virtual reality. You can also create your own using a fully VR level editor.

name: Jack in the Box
description: Your son found an imaginary friend. But you have no idea what terrors are you about to witness...

name: Neocon Tower Defence 3
description: A finger-blisteringly action-packed Tower Defence advanture!

name: Lewd Girls: Hentai Puzzle
description: Discover the best Hentai Puzzle Game on Steam! Enjoy stunning art, beautiful ladies, soothing music - all to make your evening delightful!

name: The Legend of Chuck
description: Sin descripción

name: Labyrinthian Lockdown
description: Klondor is in grave danger of being overwhelmed, enter the Labyrinth, prepare your defences, defend your Mana Crystal and annihilate the incoming waves of enemy forces that pose a threat to the Kingdom.

name: Princess Polly
description: Ahoy, matey! Join the ranks of a stealthy ninja, skulking through the shadows of a haunted pirate ship to reclaim the esteemed Princess Polly and her royal kin from the clutches of Captain Pegleg and his peculiar crew—part undead, part lively dancing pirates and squawking parrots!

name: Road Toad
description: Embark on a whimsical journey with Road Toad, a charming arcade adventure featuring a goofy toad navigating minimalist landscapes, collecting power-ups, and facing quirky challenges.

description: This should be simpler than other similar games. I ask it many things just because of my mental state, please don't mind.

description: Degenerate loner jailbreaks a stolen android.

description: An Apple Vision Pro port of Jetpack Joyride 2.

description: Egg is an interactive clicker game where you need to click egg to earn more eggs.

name: Jelly Shot
description: Fire jelly at targets!

name: Grand Canyon
description: This map is a representation of the Sonoran Desert, part of Arizona, made using only Ultimate Doom's stock textures. It is inspired by the autobiography of Romero, who lived in the city of Tucson, located next to this desert.

name: Say Hello to Sunshine
description: A map with the general theme of quake areas mixed with some sand areas

name: Crazy module
description: This is a classic stand-alone casual puzzle game

name: ASMR Slicing: Nice Cuts Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: DIY Paper Doll: Classy Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Drawing Carnival: Anime Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Johnny Trigger: Butcher Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cargo Duty
description: Your crew is on a mission to collect cargo. As you are going from moon to moon, there are creatures who will try and stop you. How long will you survive ?

name: Morto: Chapter 2
description: This is the second part of the psychological horror Morto

name: Snow Moto: Racing Adventure
description: Rev your snowmobile through crisp mountain air, conquering treacherous terrains with thrilling speed.

name: Sex Euphoria
description: Welcome to the captivating world of emotions and discoveries - the game Sex Euphoria ! Immerse yourself in a thrilling visual novel where each photograph is a step towards the pinnacle of success and ecstasy.

name: Escape From The Test
description: I hate studying, it's too much trouble. If you think so, you might be attacked by "him" too...? Let's escape from the "zero point test" together with the main character!

name: Steel Echoes
description: Confront monsters for safety, but a turned back invites terror. Armed with a flashlight, navigate haunted halls, dodge steel monsters, and unveil the dark history of a malevolent gallery. Your choices shape destiny in this atmospheric horror. Break free, or be ensnared in unending night?

name: Simple Stock Trading Simulator
description: Dive into the world of day trading with 'Simple Stock Trading Simulator.' Easy-to-play, yet challenging. Test your skills, reach goals, and experience the thrill!

name: Space Strider
description: Space Strider is a 2D Sidescroller Shoot 'em up with Roguelite elements, where you beat hordes of enemies and defeat unique bosses. Unlock, upgrade and level up your Spaceships to become the ultimate Space Strider!

name: The Mystery of the Village's Sacred Tree
description: The mystery of the village's sacred tree. The day of the festival is approaching. The happiness and pleasure of people. The salvation of mankind by the cursed village begins now. ・Game Introduction A visual novel style horror adventure game!

name: Castlevania: Aria of Sorrow - Reprise
description: Reprise is a roguelike mod for Aria of Sorrow which allows for endless randomized gameplay, along with extensive rebalancing and new features! Rooms, enemies, items, and shop are randomized, along with custom content and modifications. Mod is still in development but is almost feature complete at this point.

name: Mega Fast Food
description: Build and manage your own fast food store. Decide how your store will look like, hire the best staff, manage inventory, offer drive-thru, create your own custom food menu. Become the best and most popular fast food store in town!

name: Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy
description: Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy is a indie game developed by GAMEPULSE. You play as the Touhou famous character Cirno, become a hero, and embark on her journey to liberate the Gensoukyo and save her dear princess.

name: Sweet Desire 3
description: Hentai clicker with sexy anime girls. Undress hot beauties and satisfy them!

name: Subluminal
description: Subluminal is a 3D car driving platformer about gaining speed and going fast.

name: School Owner
description: School Owner is a construction and management simulation game where you manage an entire school, from pre-school to college.

name: Construct PRO
description: Construct PRO is a sandbox-designer, where you can assemble any structure using metal parts, bolts, and nuts and test its physical behavior.

name: Encounter Dinosaurs
description:
Come face-to-face with our prehistoric past and encounter life...66 million years ago!

Welcome to the world of the Cretaceous, where giants walked the Earth and Mother Nature reigned supreme.

“Encounter Dinosaurs” is something you need to experience to believe.

name: Unbridled: An Untameable Story
description: Unbridled: An Untameable Story is the second and final book of the Untameable series. It succeeds its first book, Untameable.

name: Truth of Blood
description:
Passing a graduation exam with your life?
Graduation, death... or love?
A dizzying romance with 4 charming men of 4 colors, a time of blood and death (Truth of Blood).

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 4 Golden Persona Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal Phantom Thieves Costume Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal BGM Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal Shujin Academy Costume Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 4 Golden Yasogami High Costume Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Memary: Memory of The Nameless One
description: The mysterious cat offer help to guide you. The room with puzzle awaits you and when you solve it, you will regain your memory. To reclaim your identity, you choose to follow mysterious cat and solve all puzzle in the rooms of question.

name: Gaslamp Cases 8: Quest for the Relic
description: Sin descripción

name: Mage and the Grimoire of Beast
description:
A slightly naughty GBC-style SHMUP (STG)!

Select a Grimoire that contains the power of a magical beast, and wear its power to advance through the stage and defeat the deepest bosses.

name: Russian Hut Simulator
description: An interactive tour of a traditional wooden hut.

name: Furry Femboys: Fantasy
description: Furry Femboys meet Fantasy!

name: Cross Impact: Cowboy
description: Download and play Cowboy from Your Only Move Is HUSTLE in Cross Impact!

name: Got High
description: GOT HIGH - Engage in battle against the crowd in an exhilarating brawl, speed through labyrinthine traps in races, and compete on the arena in an exciting shooter. Three unique mini-games in one world, full of action and challenges. Are you ready for this multi-level challenge?

name: Dreams of the Void
description: May Campbell moved to the island of Cassiopeia years ago to live with her grandfather. Now, she she tries to survive day by day in a rotting world. Solve puzzles, uncover truths, and help May see tomorrow's daylight in this strange narrative-driven exploration/puzzle game.

name: Stories to Tell: Run Away
description: In "Stories to Tell - Run Away" you are a young Spanish man named Mike who is staying at his grandparents' house since his parents have gone on a trip. One night his grandparents went out to dinner and Mike was all alone, or so he thought...

name: Pixel Pete
description: Pixel Pete is an action-packed platformer game where you play as the intrepid Pixel Pete. Armed with a trusty FISH GUN, additional weaponry, and a talking cardboard cutout that only he can see and hear, as he embarks on a mission to collapse the multiverse and find his way back home.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Prehistoric Paradise
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Prehistoric themed tables that pack a blast from the past!

name: Otoko Orgy at Maid Boy Manor
description: Your parents are away and it’s time to play! You can finally get your grubby little hands on the sweet and soft maids that work in your mansion, only to find out that these pretty maids are actually… boys?!

name: GhostHunt With Triggered Insaan
description: A Horror Game Featuring Triggered Insaan (Nischay Malhan) as a Ghost Hunter.

name: Reincarnation Tower
description: Reincarnation Tower gives you the trial to reincarnation. In order to reach the top, you need to overcome several gimmicks using only jumps. Let's take on the challenge carefully, as one failure will have irreversible consequences!

name: The Argument Solver
description: Are you tired of solving your arguments the diplomatic way. Grab your Opponent and throw things at each other just like your primate would!

name: Don’t Face Up
description: Don’t Face Up is a first-person horror game. Never make eye contact with them. They may appear and disappear. They may be standing in the direction you suddenly turn your eyes. Even in such a situation, you must proceed with your search for the building. Therefore, "Don’t Face Up."

name: Rat Race
description: Engage in a top-down rhythm puzzle game with a built-in level editor. Unravel the Rat Race mystery, find freedom, and save your fellow test subjects. Evade blasts, lasers, and fallen test subjects. Create, and share unfair level designs with your friends through steam.

name: Dump The Corpse
description: It's a puzzle game, an action game, and a dark humour game that mixes a lot of gameplay. The game focuses on a housewife who is oppressed by life, since she married a husband who can't make money, her life is incredibly bad, so she can make the choice to kill him.

name: Theory
description: "Theory" is an intense first-person shooter (FPS) game set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by hordes of ravenous zombies. Players find themselves in a vast, desolate landscape. As a survivor, you'll navigate through various environments.

name: Kill AI
description: An RPG with multiple endings written by AI. All interactions with the player that are in the game show the real attitude of the evil AI towards a person.

name: Toward Pianist
description: This is a game and simulation that allows anyone to easily play the piano with a keyboard. You can load and play more than 10 classic songs and any song you want as a MIDI file .Try a piano rhythm game you've never experienced before.

name: Valley of Kings
description: An empire once sprawling with life, destroyed by the dragon's flames Venture into a ravaged world overtaken by wild beasts and bloodthirsty bandits. Build your settlement, explore unknowns lands, uncover great treasures, fight dangerous enemies, and ultimately bring an end to the dragon's reign!

name: Verum
description: Verum: a thought-provoking game exploring ethical issues surrounding tech corporations and personal data usage. Embark on a journey through multiple side stories, gain diverse perspectives, and unlock multiple endings to uncover the full story. Simple yet immersive gameplay with captivating graphics

name: Vita: Rift of a Nation
description: Follow Naysa-Dae. An Earth Vita, as she discovers what freedom is, fights to keep it and free the nation of Opolo. Be the rift that the world of Atria will never forget.

name: Replay
description: After a long and busy day, you found this old looking game on your way home, it seems interesting so you take it with you.

name: I commissioned some stickmen
description: I paid artists to hide stickmen and paper planes in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Super Fruit Ninja
description: Fruit Ninja is back and this time the power is in your hands! Slice your way through 4 modes of fruit annihilating fun. Charge up juice canisters and unleash your Juice Jitsu power onto unsuspecting fruits! Play fetch with Truffles and make sure you give him a pat! Most importantly, make Sensei proud!

name: Nip For Speed
description: In the chilly night, emerging from a haze, you're in a vintage car hurtling down an otherworldly highway, driven by a cat. Cigarettes, moonlight and the open road, what mysteries lies ahead?

name: Interstellar Plunderer
description: Interstellar Plunderer is an indie arcade-style 3D roguelike space shooter game. Take control of a pirate spaceship as you fly through wormholes, do battles with hordes of oncoming enemies, fight fearsome bosses, and gain plunder to spend on new ships and upgrades. How far can you go?

name: Kevin(1997-2077)
description: Kevin wants to show what his life would be and why.他用没人懂的语言写了一本书。 A language-deciphering game.

name: Praxis Fighter X
description: Dodge bullets and fight off the militarized police force defending a corporate toxic sludge pipeline.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Fast Food
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Instruction
description:
Instruction is a story based clicker game where you, an employee of a power plant, are tasked with generating power for your city. The powerplant's built in intelligence mentor program, or I.M.P. for short, will help you generate the necessary amount of voltage to fulfill your quota. I.M.P may have developed a little too much of a personality for the powerplant's liking, but don't worry! It's still more than capable of keeping you on track.

In this game you'll be tasked with using different systems to generate power. Each system works differently and can be upgraded to increase your efficiency. Discover each of the power plant's mechanisms, and uncover the story behind your less than friendly companion.

name: Milkman Mayhem
description: Mind controlled cows are headed straight for you. Scavenge, barricade, and defend as long as you can. How long will you survive the dairy onslaught?

name: Solace Inc.
description: A time-traveling autobattler where you assemble the best mercenaries (with the biggest bosoms) to fight off hordes of enemies.

name: Rock Canvas
description: On Rock Canvas, you are the artist! With the help of a variety of tools, create sculptures for Rocky's cave. But be careful, Rocky is a little demanding with his sculptures, he will tell you what tool to use for his next great masterpiece!

name: Nothing Together
description:
Nothing Together is a game that requires you to do nothing. If you act in the game, it's game over. All you have to do is be idler.
Multimode has two modes, Together mode and Battle Royale. In Together mode, up to 20 people unite to do nothing. In Battle Royale, you compete to see who does the least.

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Jumping Alphabet Soup
description:
Sharpen your senses and prepare to dive into the tasty world of words! The Jumping Alphabet Soup takes you through three delicious cuisines, each with its own unique levels and charm.

With 15 challenging levels, this video game will put your word skills to the ultimate test!

name: Half-demon Kamia
description: Half-demon Kamia is in a 3D single-player game, set in an expansive boxed world. Embark on a journey as a being torn between humanity and demonic heritage.

name: Surveillance Work
description: Surveillance Work is a horror spot-the-difference game where you monitor surveillance camera footage to discover and report anomalies.

name: Black stone
description: This is a very fun strategy game that tests players' strategies.

name: 99 Waves
description: 99 Waves is a casual platformer rogue-lite game about a vengeful young man who challenges a god. Can he defeat countless monsters, the greatest warriors, and mythical beings to reach the despicable god and become a legend?

name: Farm Day Simulator 2024
description: Embark on a journey of growth, discovery, and endless fun in Farm Day Simulator 2024.

name: Point'n'Click Lovers: Daedalic Adventure Bundle
description: Six classic adventures in one bundle

name: Cooking Arena: 3 in 1 Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Knight Party
description: As a lord on the continent of Oren, lead your knights on various adventures!!

name: Burning Dead Reloaded
description: Burning Dead Reloaded is a first person shooter on rails that immerses you in the thrilling saga of Mike Pacheco, a former security chief now branded a fugitive. Mike finds himself at the heart of a zombie bio-apocalypse caused by a genome altered using CRISPR technology

name: Paco El Hare vs Los Marcianos Siderales
description: A brief piece of history about Spanish software and video games.

name: Fan Zhuan 21 Ke
description: You will play an excellent detective with a history of retired soldiers, accidentally wrapped into the case of life and death brothers involved in, and stepped into a life and death of a difficult to predict the maze, and this maze behind the layers of unseen crises and crimes.

name: Project: Neo
description: A free-to-play sci-fi action roguelike game set in an alien world where the sun never shines. Explore the world as a ‘Planet Adventurer’. Fight hostile creatures, gather ore, and interact with the local community in your downtime. Upgrade your gear with resources earned during your expeditions.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen: Cursed Clash - Ultimate Edition
description:
The Ultimate Edition includes:
• Jujutsu Kaisen Cursed Clash
• Hidden Inventory/Premature Death
• Anime Ending Theme 1 Outfit Set
• Jujusta 2024
• Digital Artbook & Soundtrack

name: Jujutsu Kaisen: Cursed Clash - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• Jujutsu Kaisen Cursed Clash
• Hidden Inventory/Premature Death
• Jujusta 2024

name: Fluffy Developers
description: Fluffy Developers - Is an exciting adventure that immerses players into a unique atmosphere of anime culture and game festivals.

name: Trouble Magnet
description: Accompany Charlie, who is transported to different times in the universe, in surviving the challenging nature of the ocean and returning to his own time.

name: Humpi and Hemicube
description: Step into a mind-bending world where gravity dances to your tune! In this 3d puzzle adventure, you'll navigate through a mesmerizing realm where every object possesses its own gravitational pull. Twist, teleport and turn your way through gravity-defying challenges that'll test your wits.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal Persona Set 1
description: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal Persona Set 1 contains additional content that allows you to use Personas from Persona 5 Royal.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal Persona Set 2
description: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal Persona Set 2 contains additional content that allows you to use Personas from Persona 5 Royal.

name: Persona 3 Reload: DLC Pack
description: Persona 3 Reload DLC Pack includes all purchasable additional content.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Digital Premium Edition
description:
Persona 3 Reload - Digital Deluxe Edition contents:
• Base game
• P4G BGM Set (Pre-Order Bonus)
• Digital Artbook
• Digital Soundtrack
• Persona 3 Reload DLC Pack (includes all DLC available at launch)

name: Persona 3 Reload: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Persona 3 Reload - Digital Deluxe Edition contents:
• Base game
• P4G BGM Set (Pre-Order Bonus)
• Digital Artbook
• Digital Soundtrack

description:
Persona 3 Reload - Limited Box content:
• Base game
• P4G BGM Set (Pre-Order Bonus)
• Artbook
• Soundtrack

name: Persona 3 Reload: Aigis Edition
description:
Persona 3 Reload - Aigis Edition content:
• Base game
• P4G BGM Set (Pre-Order Bonus)
• Artbook
• Soundtrack
• Aigis Figure
• Persona 3 Reload DLC Pack (includes all DLC available at launch)

name: Rocococo: Audiogame Fantastique
description: Rocococo ~ Audiogame Fantastique is a music-based, singleplayer adventure that has no visuals and can be played by anyone from fully blind to fully sighted. Using just your ears and spatial audio tech, you must listen, discover, and re-assemble songs to help the robo-Butler defeat the evil Queen!

name: Deaths Toll
description: Journey across the world with a deadly beast always right on your tail! Go alone or with a buddy as you search for supplies, compete in dance-offs, meet a bunch of weirdos, and fight off hordes of monsters in a randomly generated quest for survival!

name: Team Disorder
description: Team Disorder is a Sci-Fi Action-adventure Pirate 3D video game! The main character is played in either the first or the third-person options. This game includes four Open World maps with many secret levels. All maps have hundreds of Bad Actors to address.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen: Cursed Clash
description: Jujutsu Kaisen: Cursed Clash is an action-fighting game based on the manga series Jujutsu Kaisen.

name: Persona 3 Reload
description:
Step into the shoes of a transfer student thrust into an unexpected fate when entering the hour "hidden" between one day and the next. Awaken an incredible power and chase the mysteries of the Dark Hour, fight for your friends, and leave a mark on their memories forever.

Persona 3 Reload is a captivating reimagining of the genre-defining RPG, reborn for the modern era.

name: Binding of Elements
description: In this action-rougelike game you'll have to survive waves of monsters and fight against bosses. You'll be able to combine different elements to get unique abilities and arm yourself against the challenges. Choose from a variety of upgrades and improve your character or abilities.

name: Champion's Chalice
description: Champion’s Chalice is a single player Roguelike Auto Battler. Choose your champion, buy units and items, roll the shop, and battle enemy parties. Discover unique and powerful synergies as you traverse varied environments in search of prized treasure. Can you find the chalice?

name: Electro Magnate
description: Energy business clicker: buy power generators, batteries and equip a sales office.

name: Legendary Hoplite
description: A combination of Action RPG and Tower Defense: slay monsters, find weapons, upgrade your armies, defend your base… Prevent humanity from extinction at the hands of monsters from Greek mythology and ancient tribes. Don't let them cross the gate, commander!

name: O.A.C: World Begins
description: Are you a leader? Once you convince your nation you are their leader, it will be time to show the world your own political, people management and military strategy skills. O.A.C aims to be a breath of fresh air in the grand strategy genre that will inspire its own kind of videogames!

name: Mystic Saga
description:
Embark on an extraordinary journey in the world of Mystic Saga, where the thrill of assembling a diverse ensemble of extraordinary allies intertwines seamlessly with the exhilaration of engaging in strategic conflicts.
Uncover mystical beings with unique abilities, and strategically deploy them in epic battles that test your tactical prowess. Explore the enchanting realms, discover rare companions, and forge alliances as you delve into the rich narrative of Mystic Saga.
Your destiny awaits as you master the art of collection and immerse yourself in the heart-pounding excitement of battle, shaping the saga that echoes through the ages.

developers.name: China Mobile Games and Entertainment Group (CMGE)

name: Glory's Witness
description: "Glory's Witness" is a platform jump shooting game that supports attribute addition. You will play the AI intelligent robot that survived the last days, guided by the "God", and embark on an adventure to "witness the glory of human civilization".
